name: Legend of Grimrock

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

extract.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
exe: game/start.sh
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
